title: Rewards
body:
I think a great idea for League of Legends would be to add rewards for completing challenges,
whether these challenges be daily, weekly, monthly, or all-time. Similarly to Runescape,
for completing a task, such as "Achieve 1 pentakill" in the weekly challenges, rewarding the
player with an IP, RP, champion, skin etc.
Even though this is only a rough idea I think it would add a lot to the game and make it so much
more entertaining and exciting!

Thanks,
tubbsyy06

replies.body: "Achieve one pentakill" is pretty unrealistic for a weekly thing. However, the idea isn't too bad. Like, just if they gave us a chance to get some extra IP once in a while.
I was just using that as an example, they can be for doing anything not just kill-based activities
I know. You make a good suggestion though. Everyone who has felt the grind that is getting a 6300 champion could appreciate a little bit of bonus IP.
don't think it'd work out that well...
